translations.text: Have you not considered, [O Muá¸¥ammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?<sup foot_note=197817>1</sup>
Did He not make their plan into misguidance?<sup foot_note=197818>1</sup>
And He sent against them birds in flocks,
Striking them with stones of hard clay,
And He made them like eaten straw.<sup foot_note=197819>1</sup>
